thought: The error is caused because action_1 and action_2 are defined to accept only one argument (input_data), but in mainWorkflow they are called with two arguments (input_data and params), causing a TypeError. The correct approach is to keep action_1 and action_2 accepting only input_data, and define params inside these functions. Then in mainWorkflow, call action_1 and action_2 with only input_data. I will fix mainWorkflow accordingly.
plan: Modify mainWorkflow to call action_1 with only pg_input
Modify mainWorkflow to call action_2 with only slack_messages
Keep action_1 and action_2 definitions unchanged
Test the workflow to confirm no TypeError and correct execution
criticism: The main issue is calling action functions with two arguments when they accept only one, causing TypeError. Fixing call sites is simpler and aligns with current function definitions.
